The healthcare community is in mourning today!  #RIP Maureen Ambersley, a frontline nurse who worked in #LTC at Extendicare Mississauga, has died of #COVID19.  Her colleagues say her death was preventable & the result of ongoing policy failures.  We need change now! 💔💔💔  https://t.co/ORACiLvlPy

My mom & dad both got the Moderna vaccine today. My dad lives in LTC and my mom is his essential caregiver. I’m THRILLED, grateful, hopeful.  My mom won’t let me post her vax selfie (ha) so here’s a pic of my dad from one of our two visits since February. Hang in there everyone.  https://t.co/kcYjH6lCII
